description: A sweet dessert with a deliciously crunchy topping.
name: Stewed Nectarine Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 vanilla pod, split in half lenghtways

recipeInstructions.text: In a large sauce pan on a medium heat, add the wine, vanilla pod, sugar and nectarines.
Cook until the sugar has melted, then lower the heat and allow to simmer for 15 minutes until the sauce starts to reduce, stirring occasionally.
After 15 minutes you can remove the nectarines from the pan and place into your serving dish.
Allow the sauce in the pan to keep cooking to reduce further and also heat up the grill in your oven.
While the sauce is reducing, whip the cream with the icing and allspice until fluffy.
Combine the flour, caster sugar and butter together and then place on top of the nectarines in your serving dishes and grill for 10 minutes.
Carefully remove from the oven, add the cream to the top of the crumble and then drizzle some of the reduced sauce over the top before serving removing the vanilla pod.
